hr.fer.oop.lab3

Class FootballPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • hr.fer.oop.lab3.Person
      • hr.fer.oop.lab3.FootballPlayer

  • public class FootballPlayer
extends Person
    This class represents football players, with their name, country and emotion level inherited from the Person class, with the addition of Football Player's playing skill and his natural playing position.
    Author:
    karlo

    • Constructor Detail

      • FootballPlayer

        public FootballPlayer()
        Constructs a new object of type FootballPlayer

      • FootballPlayer

        public FootballPlayer(java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.String country,
                      int emotion,
                      int playingSkill,
                      PlayingPosition playingPosition)
        Constructs a new object of type FootballPlayer. All variables in this type must be initialized when calling a constructor. Variables name, country and emotions are unchangeable after calling this constructor.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the Person
        country - country in which the Person lives
        emotion - Person's emotion level
        playingSkill - Football Player's playing skill
        playingPosition - Football Player's natural playing position

        public void setPlayingSkill(int playingSkill)
        Sets the Football Player's playing skill
        Parameters:
        playingSkill - Football Player's playing skill to set, should be in range [0, 100].
